name: Gr-O
description: Master the art of evolution, and learn to Gr-O! This game is a very small and short game made for a competition with another YouTuber, however, it gives a great experience and it's addicting. Take it from me, someone who codes games for no exact reason besides the fact that I find it's enjoyable... besides the point, Gr-O is fun!!! Give it a try, and you won't regret it. Updates coming sOoN.
